fields.name: AliasName
fields.description: The alias name. This is a legacy parameter and is no longer used.

fields.name: ColumnName
fields.description: The column name on which the data masking rule is applied.

fields.name: MaskingFunction
fields.description: The masking function that is used for the data masking rule.

fields.name: NumberFrom
fields.description: The numberFrom property of the masking rule. Required if maskingFunction is set to Number, otherwise this parameter will be ignored.

fields.name: NumberTo
fields.description: The numberTo property of the data masking rule. Required if maskingFunction is set to Number, otherwise this parameter will be ignored.

fields.name: PrefixSize
fields.description: If maskingFunction is set to Text, the number of characters to show unmasked in the beginning of the string. Otherwise, this parameter will be ignored.

fields.name: ReplacementString
fields.description: If maskingFunction is set to Text, the character to use for masking the unexposed part of the string. Otherwise, this parameter will be ignored.

fields.name: RuleState
fields.description: The rule state. Used to delete a rule. To delete an existing rule, specify the schemaName, tableName, columnName, maskingFunction, and specify ruleState as disabled. However, if the rule doesn't already exist, the rule will be created with ruleState set to enabled, regardless of the provided value of ruleState.

fields.name: SchemaName
fields.description: The schema name on which the data masking rule is applied.

fields.name: SuffixSize
fields.description: If maskingFunction is set to Text, the number of characters to show unmasked at the end of the string. Otherwise, this parameter will be ignored.

fields.name: TableName
fields.description: The table name on which the data masking rule is applied.
